DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double-blinded placebo control trial cefazolin time cesarean section fo infection prophylaxis . Subjects randomize cefazolin either 30 minute prior skin incision time cord-clamping . Primary outcome infectious morbidity include wound infection endometritis .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant 2443 week gestation > 18 year old Requiring cesarean section Receiving antibiotic < 18 year old Allergy cefazolin
